branchCategory.name: BP1000, Welded Connection Back Pressure Regulator for Ultra High Purity
branchCategory.description: The BP1000W is a welded connection series, back pressure regulator for ultra high purity (UHP) gas delivery in semiconductor and other clean industries.  Available options include Hastelloy internals for corrosion resistance, a tube stub weld fitting connection type, and various surface finishes.

breadCrumb.name: BP1000, Welded Connection Back Pressure Regulator for Ultra High Purity
